title: What Will She Do Next
itunes:title: What Will She Do Next
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I have never written into a show before so be easy on me. I’m married to a woman that I did not date long enough. In the beginning, she told me she is a very religious type of woman because she knows I’m a preacher’s kid. She wouldn’t let me touch her below the waist or do anything until our wedding night. I was so in to her because she said all the right things, she cooked the foods I like and she kept a clean house..........................................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I have never written into a show before so be easy on me. I’m married to a woman that I did not date long enough. In the beginning, she told me she is a very religious type of woman because she knows I’m a preacher’s kid. She wouldn’t let me touch her below the waist or do anything until our wedding night. I was so in to her because she said all the right things, she cooked the foods I like and she kept a clean house..........................................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
